description:
Quickly and easily stick your bike on the roof and hit the road! This universal upright rack works with factory car racks up to 3in. wide, plus Thule® rectangular and Yakima® round roof bars.

  • Transports a bike without removing the wheels
  • Clamps the bike's downtube. Secures with a locking knob on the clamp arm
  • Tie-down straps for front and rear wheels included
  • Accommodates most frame sizes
  • Fits tires up to 3 in. wide
  • Supports up to 15.8kg (35lbs)
name: Swagman Upright Roof Rack Bike Mount
